metadata.name: LLM Pricing Sources Registry
metadata.description: Official pricing pages for all supported LLM providers
metadata.usage: Use these URLs to verify and update model pricing

openai.name: OpenAI
openai.notes: Pricing page has complete list. Check for prompt caching and batch API discounts.

anthropic.name: Anthropic (Claude)
anthropic.notes: Models page shows latest generation. Check for extended thinking costs.

google.name: Google (Gemini)
google.notes: Gemini API pricing differs from Vertex AI. Use Gemini API pricing. Check context-tiered pricing.

deepseek.name: DeepSeek
deepseek.notes: Check for prompt caching discounts on V3 and R1.

mistral.name: Mistral AI
mistral.notes: Pricing embedded in technology page. Check for La Plateforme pricing.

meta.name: Meta (Llama)
meta.notes: Llama is open-source. Use Together AI pricing as reference for hosted pricing.

cohere.name: Cohere
cohere.notes: Consider adding Command R+ if it becomes mainstream.
